## Tips
You can use the following regular expressions to extract entities:

Machine Domain: (?<!,)system(?!,)
Physical Device: (?<!,)device(?!,)
Environment Entity: (?<!,)entity(?!,)
Design Domain: (?<!,)domain(?!,)
Requirements: (?<!,)requirement(?!,)
Shared Phenomena: (?<!,)phenomena(?!,)
